properties.value: Attack, Strength, and Defence are all trained in similar ways through combat. Strength can be trained slowly through barbarian fishing, and Defence can also be trained with Ranged or Magic while on the defensive combat style.

Guides

  • 2 Fluid Strikes interactions (T3 Melee Relic)

    • 3.1 Weapons

Overview[edit | edit source]

Attack, Strength, and Defence are all trained in similar ways through combat. Strength can be trained slowly through barbarian fishing, and Defence can also be trained with Ranged or Magic while on the defensive combat style.

The tier 3 and tier 6 relics are combat related.

Fluid Strikes interactions (T3 Melee Relic)[edit | edit source]

Fluid Strikes has the effect "The attack speed of all melee weapons is halved (rounded up)."

Rounded up is important here, this means that any weapon with uneven attack speed (Notably Dragon longsword, Granite maul, Dharok's greataxe, Dragon 2h sword, Scythe of vitur and Crystal halberd) gains less than 100% increased attack speed of Fluid Strikes; only 66% and 75% for 5/7 tick attack speed respectively.

As such in ex. a comparison of damage between a Dragon longsword and a Dragon scimitar the Dragon scimitar has 50% faster attack speed, compared to the normal 25% faster attack speed. (5/4 to 3/2)

In effect this means that for DPS output, weapons with uneven tick attack speed is always significantly worse and should be avoided if possible.

Notable gear by region[edit | edit source]

Regions in the required column are always required. However, only one of the optional regions is required.

Weapons[edit | edit source]

Gear Required regions Optional regions Notes
Dragon scimitar Kandarin✓ Can be purchased for 100,000 coins from Daga's Scimitar Smithy
Dragon longsword Misthalin✓ Can be purchased for 100,000 coins from Jukat (shop)
Rapier Morytania✓ Can be purchased for 25,600 by speaking to Smith, identical stats to Rune Scimitar but with the stab and slash attack bonuses swapped
Abyssal bludgeon Misthalin✓ The components to make the bludgeon are obtained from the unsired
Abyssal whip Misthalin✓ Morytania✓ Dropped by abyssal demons and Abyssal Sire
Abyssal tentacle Kandarin✓ Misthalin✓ Morytania✓ Made by combining a tentacle with an abyssal whip
Dragon 2h sword Desert✓ Wilderness✓ The dragon 2h sword is dropped by most Wilderness bosses and the Kalphite Queen
Granite maul Morytania✓ Since LMS is disabled, the special attack cannot be reduced to 50%
Saradomin sword Asgarnia✓ Unlike most two-handed weapons in the game, the Saradomin sword has an attack speed of 4
Zamorakian spear Asgarnia✓ –
Zamorakian hasta Asgarnia✓ Kandarin✓ The hasta is made by taking a Zamorakian spear to Otto Godblessed, along with a payment of 300,000 coins
Crystal halberd Kandarin✓ Tirannwn✓ The special attack can deal damage against large groups of enemies
Dharok's greataxe Morytania✓ Attacks deal more damage as hitpoints decrease if the rest of Dharok the Wretched's equipment is worn
Barrelchest anchor Morytania✓ A damaged anchor can be obtained from Brother Tranquility and repaired by speaking to Smith for 230,000 or bought repaired from Perdu for 290,000
Blade of saeldor Tirannwn✓ Best slash weapon
Ghrazi rapier Morytania✓ Highest stab and Stength bonus for any weapon of its attack speed
Scythe of vitur Morytania✓ Can hit up to three enemies simultaneously
Inquisitor's mace Morytania✓ Best crush weapon
Viggora's chainmace Wilderness✓ When Viggora's chainmace is charged with revenant ether, an additional 50% melee accuracy and damage boost is applied when attacking any NPC in the Wilderness

Helmets[edit | edit source]

Gear Required regions Optional regions Strength bonus Notes
Black mask Morytania✓ +16.67% Provides a 16.67% boost to Attack and Strength against all monsters on the player's current Slayer task
Slayer helmet (i) Kandarin✓ Morytania✓ +16.67% 1,250,000 coins are required to imbue at the Nightmare Zone
Dragon full helm Kandarin✓ +0 Can be obtained as a rare drop from mithril dragons
Helm of neitiznot Fremennik✓ +3 –
Neitiznot faceguard Fremennik✓ +6 Made by combining a basilisk jaw with a helm of neitiznot
Serpentine helm Tirannwn✓ +5 Grants immunity to poison and venom
Inquisitor's great helm Morytania✓ +4 When equipped, the great helm boosts damage and accuracy by 0.5% when using the crush attack style
Obsidian helmet Karamja✓ +3 –

Shield slot[edit | edit source]

Gear Required regions Optional regions Strength bonus Notes
Dragon sq shield Fremennik✓ Kandarin✓ +0 Made by combining the shield left half and the shield right half.
Dragon defender Asgarnia✓ +6 Farmable at Warriors' Guild. Bring a black armour purchasable from Horvik's Armour Shop. and Champions' Guild. Food purchasable on site. Excellent to combine with Slayer Task: Hill giants (substitutes them). ~4-6 hours to get.
Avernic defender Asgarnia✓ Morytania✓ +8 Requires Dragon defender
Dragonfire shield Karamja✓ Fremennik✓ +7 Dropped by dragons in Brimhaven Dungeon or Lithkren Vault
Crystal shield Tirannwn✓ +0 Made by combining 40 crystal shards with one crystal weapon seed at a singing bowl in Prifddinas
Elysian spirit shield Wilderness✓ +0 Requires 75 to equip
Toktz-ket-xil Karamja✓ +5 Provides a +5 Strength bonus. Awards League Points when equipped. (As all Obsidian equipment does)

Chest slot[edit | edit source]

Gear Required regions Optional regions Strength bonus Notes
Dragon chainbody Desert✓ Kandarin✓ +0 –
Dragon platebody Fremennik✓ Kandarin✓ +0 Made by combining a dragon metal lump and dragon metal shard with a dragon chainbody
Obsidian platebody Karamja✓ +3 –
Fighter torso Kandarin✓ +4 Obtained from Barbarian Assault
Bandos chestplate Asgarnia✓ +4 Unlike the other body armours which provide a strength bonus, the Bandos chestplate also has substantial defensive bonuses
Inquisitor's hauberk Morytania✓ +4 When equipped, the hauberk boosts damage and accuracy by 0.5% when using the crush attack style

Legs slot[edit | edit source]

Gear Required regions Optional regions Strength bonus Notes
Obsidian platelegs Karamja✓ +1 Can be purchased for 100,500 tokkul
Bandos tassets Asgarnia✓ +2 Highest Strength bonus for the leg slot
Dragon plateskirt Karamja✓ Fremennik✓ +0 Drops semi-frequently from Steel Dragon and Skeletal Wyvern. Very good to combine with slayer task.
Dragon platelegs Karamja✓ Fremennik✓ +0 Drops semi-frequently from Steel Dragon and Skeletal Wyvern. Very good to combine with slayer task.
Granite legs Asgarnia✓ +0 Drops semi-frequently from Skeletal Wyvern. Very good to combine with slayer task.

Boots[edit | edit source]

Gear Required regions Optional regions Strength bonus
Rune boots Morytania✓ Tirannwn✓ +2
Dragon boots Asgarnia✓ Wilderness✓ +4
Primordial boots Asgarnia✓ Wilderness✓ +5
Guardian boots Asgarnia✓ Morytania✓ +3
Bandos boots Asgarnia✓ +0
Granite boots Morytania✓ +3
Climbing boots Asgarnia✓ +2

Jewellery[edit | edit source]

Gear Required regions Optional regions Strength bonus Notes
Berserker ring Fremennik✓ +4 Always provides at least 1 max hit
Berserker ring (i) Fremennik✓ Kandarin✓ +8 Requires 650,000 coins to imbue
Explorer's ring 1 Misthalin✓ +0 Provides +1 to Prayer. Easy to get.
Amulet of strength Misthalin✓ +10 Lootable from the H.A.M. Store room. Lvl 49 magic to enchant. Common drop from the Giant Mole
Amulet of power Misthalin✓ +6 Lootable from the H.A.M. Store room. Lvl 57 magic to enchant
Amulet of fury Karamja✓ Asgarnia✓ Tirannwn✓ +8 –
Amulet of blood fury Morytania✓ +8 Has a 20% chance to heal for 30% of the damage dealt
Amulet of torture Kandarin✓ +10 Requires a zenyte
Regen bracelet Karamja✓ Asgarnia✓ Tirannwn✓ +7 Requires an onyx
Combat bracelet Misthalin✓ +6 Requires a dragonstone which can be found in a variety of places

Other items and bonuses[edit | edit source]

Gear Required regions Optional regions Strength bonus Notes
Piety Asgarnia✓ Kandarin✓ +varies Gives a 25% boost to Defence, a 23% boost to Strength, and 20% to Attack.

Requires 70

Adamant gloves Asgarnia✓ Kandarin✓ +7 –
Rune gloves Asgarnia✓ Kandarin✓ Desert✓ Fremennik✓ +8 –
Cape of legends Fremennik✓ Kandarin✓ +0 –
Mythical cape Fremennik✓ Kandarin✓ +1 –
Fire cape Karamja✓ +4 –
Infernal cape Karamja✓ +8 –
Obsidian cape Karamja✓ +0 –
Void melee helm Asgarnia✓ +10% Provides a 10% bonus to melee damage and accuracy if worn with the rest of the Void set
